items.sentence: Tom's parents died in an automobile accident when he was three.
Tom found out that Mary was the one who had stolen his bicycle.
Tom tried to show Mary the picture without letting John see it.
You aren't really planning to paint your house purple, are you?
The reason I don't do it is because I don't feel like doing it.
It isn't until we lose our health that we appreciate its value.
The world history exam proved to be easier than I had expected.
I hope the time will soon come when there would be no more war.
The thought flashed through her mind that she was going to die.
Tom realized he didn't have enough money to buy what he wanted.
